perturbation.original_text:
THIS SECOND AMENDMENT TO CO-BRANDING AGREEMENT (this "Amendment") is
made and entered into, effective for all purposes and in all respects as of
the 23rd day of February, 1998, by and between PC QUOTE, INC., with its
principal place of business at 300 South Wacker Drive, Chicago, Illinois
60605 ("PCQ") and A.B. Watley, Inc., with its principal place of business at
33 West 17th Street, New York, New York 10011 ("ABW").
perturbation.changed_text:
THIS SECOND AMENDMENT TO CO-BRANDING AGREEMENT (this "Understanding") is
made and entered into, effective for all purposes and in all respects as of
the 23rd day of February, 1998, by and between PC QUOTE, INC., with its
principal place of business at 300 South Wacker Drive, Chicago, Illinois
60605 ("PCQ") and A.B. Watley, Inc., with its principal place of business at
33 West 17th Street, New York, New York 10011 ("ABW").
perturbation.explanation: Changing "Agreement" to "Understanding" can introduce ambiguity. While both terms suggest a consensus, 'Agreement' has a stronger legal standing than 'Understanding'. This could affect the contract's enforceability, especially if one party later claims they only had an 'understanding' rather than a binding agreement.

perturbation.original_text:
To the extent, if any, that provision of this Agreement
conflicts with or differs from any provision of the Agreement, such provision
of this Second Amendment shall prevail and govern for all purposes and in all
respects.
perturbation.changed_text:
To the extent, if any, that provision of this Understanding
conflicts with or differs from any provision of the Agreement, such provision
of this Second Amendment shall be interpreted according to the involved party's discretion.
perturbation.explanation: Changing "Agreement" to "Understanding" and replacing "shall prevail and govern" with "shall be interpreted according to the involved party's discretion" creates significant uncertainty. The original text provides a clear hierarchy (the Amendment prevails). The changed text allows each party to interpret conflicting provisions as they see fit, undermining the contract's binding nature. Contract interpretation should generally be governed by objective standards rather than subjective discretion.

perturbation.original_text:
Except as modified hereby, the Agreement and its terms and
provisions are hereby ratified and confirmed for all purposes and in all
respects.
perturbation.changed_text: Except as modified hereby, the parties acknowledge the Agreement and its potential provisions.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'ratified and confirmed' with 'acknowledge the Agreement and its potential provisions' significantly weakens the contractual commitment. 'Ratification and confirmation' imply a binding acceptance of the original terms. 'Acknowledging potential provisions' suggests a much weaker agreement, potentially allowing a party to later argue that they never fully agreed to specific terms.
